Text: Hi shemyaza. Thanks a lot for the rugby games you have shared. Your a life saver. Much apreciated.

One cannot say thank you enough times for your work on rugby UL. You make us enjoy this great sport no matter where we live in this world. I hope you never stop !

Best regards  & sincere thank you !

PS. Do you have the game between Aus & Eng ?
Thanks so much for this and for all the other rugby content. You a superstar. Cheers
thanks for this. i needed this game since ATT went down. lifesaver.
